setup.title: Create Your Adventure
setup.description: Design your character and world. Use the AI assistant on the right to help you brainstorm ideas!
setup.form.title: Character & World Setup
setup.ai.title: AI Assistant
setup.ai.inputPlaceholder: e.g., 'Suggest a darker background for my rogue'
setup.ai.initialMessage: Hello! I'm here to help you build your character and world. What are we creating today?
setup.ai.errorMessage: Sorry, I couldn't process that. Please try again.
setup.defaults.characterDescription: A cunning rogue with a quick wit and even quicker fingers.
setup.defaults.characterBackground: Grew up an orphan on the streets, learned to survive by their wits alone.
setup.defaults.gameSetting: A classic medieval fantasy world with sprawling kingdoms, dark forests, and ancient ruins.
setup.defaults.openingScene: You awaken in a dimly lit tavern, the smell of stale ale and sawdust filling your nostrils. Your head throbs, a dull reminder of last night's revelry. Across the room, a cloaked figure in a shadowy corner seems to be watching you. A half-empty mug of ale sits on the table before you.
discussPlot.title: Discuss with DM
editModal.description: Make changes to your item or journal entry below.
debug.title: Debug Mode: System Prompt Override
debug.description: Enter a system prompt below. This prompt will override the default system prompt for all AI flows while debug mode is active. Clear the text area to revert to default behavior.
debug.placeholder: e.g., You are a Shakespearean-era dungeon master...
editMode.label: Edit Mode
editMode.dialogDescription: Make changes to the selected dialogue entry below. This will affect the story permanently.
bodyCategory.Head: Head
